data.name: Guacamelee! 2 - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Guacamelee! 2 Original Soundtrack!

Featuring music by Peter Chapman (aka Coins), Rom Di Prisco and special guests Mariachi Entertainment System. Includes 32 brand-new original tracks, plus bonus tracks!

Comes in 320 kbps MP3 format.

Track List:
01 - Guacamelee! 2 Theme (Main Menu)
02 - First Portal
03 - Baddest Timeline
04 - Salvador's Theme
05 - Los Manglares
06 - Los Manglares (World of the Dead)
07 - The Mask of Juan
08 - Templo de Jade
09 - Templo de Jade (World of the Dead)
10 - New Boss Theme
11 - Chicken Dungeons
12 - Villachula
13 - Villachula (World of the Dead)
14 - Badlands
15 - Badlands (World of the Dead)
16 - Templo de Obsidiana
17 - Templo de Obsidiana (World of the Dead)
18 - Prisión 'El Corazón'
19 - Prisión 'El Corazón' (World of the Dead)
20 - Chicken Illuminati HQ
21 - Pueblucho Darkest Timeline
22 - Pueblucho Darkest Timeline (World of the Dead)
23 - Infierno
24 - Infierno (World of the Dead)
25 - Isla Bonita
26 - Isla Bonita (World of the Dead)
27 - La Tragedia De Salvador
28 - Templo de la Serpiente
29 - Templo de la Serpiente (World of the Dead)
30 - Salvador Battle Theme
31 - Bad Ending
32 - Good Ending
33 - End Credits (Main Menu Theme: Mariachi edition)

Bonus Tracks:
34 - BONUS TRACK - Pueblucho
35 - BONUS TRACK - Darkest Timeline Arrival (aka 'Boss Theme')
36 - BONUS TRACK - Sierra Morena
37 - BONUS TRACK - Tule Tree
38 - BONUS TRACK - Tule Tree (World of the Dead)
39 - BONUS TRACK - Leaderboards (Extended Mix)

data.short_description: The Guacamelee! 2 Original Soundtrack! Featuring music by Peter Chapman, Rom Di Prisco and special guests Mariachi Entertainment System.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
